Pre-Game Insights: Teemu Pukki believes the game against Wales will be tight and that Finland will win to bring themselves closer to another final.
Pukki has scored 12 goals in 18 MLS appearances for Minnesota United, reinvigorating his career after leaving Norwich.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Teemu Pukki is the fourth-highest scorer in Norwich's history and is currently flourishing in MLS.
Pukki has been part of the Finnish national team for a long time and is uncertain if he will continue playing after Euro 2024.
Pukki scored a goal by chasing down a goalkeeper and another by cutting in from the left, showcasing his versatility and skill.
